name: Jigsawpuzzle phonegap
tagline: A fork of jigsawpuzzle for importing at phonegap
body:
## Purpose
This project is simply a fork of [JigsawPuzzle](http://jgmy.github.io/jigsawpuzzle/), intended for being auto-exported to phone apps by phonegap.

## Downloading
You can [download the mobile apps here] (http://build.phonegap.com/apps/392747)

## More details
JigsawPuzzle is a simple html5 jigsaw made with construct2.
It can use two different tilesets.

It can use three different jigsaw pictures. More pictures could be added upon request, but take in account they consume memory in the resulting app.

## Customizing
If you want to build your own flavored app with your own image, fork this repository, add your image and edit the lista_xml.xml file, adding your image name, description, license and original url.
Please notice the url field is used exclusively as a license reference. Due javascript security restrictions, all images should be located in the same server where your app is.

## More info
For more info, refer to the [JigsawPuzzle] (http://jgmy.github.io/jigsawpuzzle/) page.
note: Don't delete this file! It's used internally to help with page regeneration.
